title: Meal plans that fit your life
description: Provide yourself with convenient and delicious meals using Eat Clean's healthy meal delivery service. We deliver from South Florida all the way to New York!
cleaned_text: Chef cooked, healthy meals delivered to youR DOOR. See our available plans and menu! Healthy Meal Delivery Service Whether your schedule doesn't leave much time for cooking or you just don't want to after a long, exhausting day, it's common to fall into a diet of easy-to-make but unhealthy meals. Thousands of hardworking Americans simply aren't able to provide their bodies with the fuel they need to thrive, so Eat Clean is here to offer healthy meal delivery services. Providing fresh and well-balanced meals nationwide, our fresh meal delivery service will bring you a large variety of nutritious foods that are as delicious as any home-cooked meal. Eat Clean's healthy meal delivery service caters to various diets, so you'll still have control over your lifestyle and ensure you enjoy every meal. [Sign](https://eatcleantogo.com/plan) up today for a more delicious and nutritious diet at only the most affordable prices! How it works America's #1 prepared meal kit. We Shop, We Cook and Deliver to your Doorstep. Choose your meals and schedule Over 500 meals available We cook & deliver Receive Fresh, ready to eat meals Directly to your door Heat, Eat, Recycle, and Repeat Ready to eat in 2 minutes. Skip a week or cancel anytime. meal plans that fit your life We offer anywhere from 4-12 meals per week, with meals as low as $9.60 each. The bigger your box, the more you'll save—and you can always pause, cancel, or change your plan at any time! 6 meals per week $12.58 per meal [sign up now](/join_now) 10 meals per week $10.90 per meal [sign up now](/join_now) 12 meals per week $10.33 per meal [sign up now](/join_now) 14 meals per week $9.60 per meal [sign up now](/join_now) Shipping and tax added at checkout
